items.name: Wood
items.description: Basic building material harvested from forests

items.name: Stone
items.description: Sturdy material found near mountains and rocky terrain

items.name: Crystal
items.description: Rare crystalline material with magical properties

items.name: Herb
items.description: Medicinal plant used for crafting potions

items.name: Ancient Wood
items.description: Petrified timber from trees that have stood for millennia, infused with natural magic

items.name: Spirit Essence
items.description: Ethereal energy captured from forest spirits, used in powerful enchantments

items.name: Sand Glass
items.description: Glass formed naturally in the scorching desert, shaped by intense heat

items.name: Cactus Fruit
items.description: Nutritious fruit from desert cacti, provides sustenance in harsh conditions

items.name: Sun Crystal
items.description: Crystallized sunlight harvested from the desert, radiates warm energy

items.name: Obsite
items.description: Volcanic obsidian infused with fire essence, extremely sharp and durable

items.name: Ember Ore
items.description: Ore that burns eternally with inner fire, core component of fire-based crafting

items.name: Fire Crystal
items.description: Crystallized flame from volcanic vents, contains immense thermal energy

items.name: Magma Core
items.description: The solidified heart of a magma elemental, pulses with volcanic power

items.name: Phoenix Feather
items.description: A feather from the legendary phoenix, grants resurrection power

items.name: Frost Stone
items.description: Stone frozen to absolute zero, never melts and radiates cold

items.name: Ice Crystal
items.description: Perfect crystal formed over centuries of frost, channels cold magic

items.name: Frozen Herb
items.description: Medicinal plant preserved in eternal ice, potent healing properties

items.name: Permafrost Core
items.description: The frozen heart of an ice elemental, maintains cryogenic temperatures

items.name: Temporal Ice
items.description: Ice that exists outside of time, can freeze moments themselves

items.name: Ley Essence
items.description: Pure magical energy drawn from ley line convergences in the savanna

items.name: Copper Ore
items.description: Common metal ore found in the badlands, useful for basic crafting

items.name: Iron Ore
items.description: Strong metal ore from badlands canyons, essential for weapons and armor

items.name: Gold Nugget
items.description: Precious metal found in badlands streams, valuable for trade and crafting

items.name: Shadow Moss
items.description: Dark moss that absorbs light, used in stealth enchantments

items.name: Dark Herb
items.description: Poisonous plant from the swamps, base ingredient for toxins and debuffs

items.name: Nightmare Essence
items.description: Condensed fear harvested from swamp nightmares, powerful in dark magic

items.name: Umbral Crystal
items.description: Crystal formed from pure darkness, absorbs and redirects shadow energy

items.name: Shadow Heart
items.description: The core of a shadow entity, grants mastery over darkness

items.name: Crystal Shard
items.description: Fragment of the great crystal spires, resonates with arcane frequencies

items.name: Resonant Crystal
items.description: Crystal that amplifies magical energy, core component of enchanting

items.name: Harmonic Gem
items.description: Perfect crystal that vibrates at reality's frequency, incredibly powerful

items.name: Void Crystal
items.description: Crystal from between dimensions, contains fragments of the void

items.name: Void Shard
items.description: Fragment of void energy solidified into physical form

items.name: Null Stone
items.description: Stone that exists in a state of quantum uncertainty, disrupts reality

items.name: Reality Fragment
items.description: A piece of stable reality torn from the void, extremely valuable

items.name: Entropy Essence
items.description: Pure entropy extracted from void rifts, decays anything it touches

items.name: Void Heart
items.description: The impossible core of a void entity, warps reality around it

items.name: Bio-Luminescent Gland
items.description: Glowing organ from neon flora, provides light and bio-energy

items.name: Neon Sap
items.description: Glowing sap from alien plants, used in healing and energy restoration

items.name: Alien Spore
items.description: Spore from xenoflora, capable of rapid regeneration

items.name: Xenoflora Core
items.description: Heart of an ancient alien plant, contains terraforming potential

items.name: Primal Genome
items.description: Complete genetic template from before time, source of all life

items.name: Plasma Cell
items.description: Contained plasma energy from the plasma fields, powers advanced tech

items.name: Energy Crystal
items.description: Crystal that stores and releases pure energy, essential for plasma tech

items.name: Conduit Shard
items.description: Fragment of ancient energy conduits, channels power efficiently

items.name: Fusion Core
items.description: Miniature fusion reactor core, provides incredible power output

items.name: Antimatter Cell
items.description: Contained antimatter from plasma storms, ultimate energy source

items.name: Rune Stone
items.description: Stone inscribed with ancient runes, foundation of runic magic

items.name: Arcane Dust
items.description: Residue from ancient magical artifacts, used in enchanting

items.name: Glyph Fragment
items.description: Piece of an ancient spell glyph, contains partial magical knowledge

items.name: Ancient Rune
items.description: Complete rune from the old civilization, powerful enchanting component

items.name: Primordial Sigil
items.description: Symbol of power from before history, grants command over fundamental forces

items.name: Stone Wall
items.description: A sturdy wall that blocks movement

items.name: Vision Beacon
items.description: A beacon that extends your vision radius

items.name: Hidden Trap
items.description: A concealed trap that damages enemies who step on it

items.name: Health Potion
items.description: Restores 1 HP when consumed

items.name: Energy Potion
items.description: Restores 20 energy when consumed

items.name: Speed Potion
items.description: Grants an extra action next turn

items.name: Scan Crystal
items.description: Reveals the entire map for one turn

items.name: Iron Sword
items.description: A basic weapon that increases damage dealt

items.name: Leather Armor
items.description: Basic armor that increases max HP

items.name: Scout's Ring
items.description: A magical ring that increases vision range

items.name: Amulet of Flames
items.description: Grants immunity to volcanic terrain damage

items.name: Frost Cloak
items.description: Reduces movement cost in ice biomes

items.name: Void Blade
items.description: A weapon forged from void crystals, deals extra damage

items.name: Phoenix Plate
items.description: Armor that grants resurrection once per game

items.name: Ring of Time
items.description: Grants an extra action every other turn
